newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle slow at $104/dressed - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle slow at $104/dressed - USDA.

text.p: Trade was rather slow following the large movement on Tuesday, USDA said.
Prices on slaughter steers and heifers near steady on limited activity. Buyer inquiry and demand fairly good, seller interest limited.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights)
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1175-1250 lbs few 64.00; Dressed basis sales 103.00-104.00, those at latter price sorted for grade.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1225 lbs 103.00-104.00, those at latter price sorted for grade. Confirmed - 1,900 For the week - 92,900
